targets.query: SELECT "height" FROM "block" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "node"
SELECT stddev("height") FROM "block" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)
SELECT sum("n")/600 AS r FROM "applied-txs" WHERE node=3 and time > now() - 10m fill(0)
targets.target: SELECT sum("n") AS r FROM "applied-txs" WHERE $timeFilter AND node =~ /$node/

targets.query: SELECT sum("n")/600 AS r FROM "applied-txs" WHERE node=7 and time > now() - 10m fill(0)
targets.target: SELECT sum("n") AS r FROM "applied-txs" WHERE $timeFilter AND node =~ /$node/

targets.query: SELECT "sum" FROM (SELECT sum("n") FROM "applied-txs" WHERE $timeFilter AND node = $node GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0)) WHERE "sum" >= 0
SELECT "sum" FROM (SELECT sum("n") FROM "applied-txs" WHERE $timeFilter AND node = $node GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0)) WHERE "sum" < 0
SELECT "r"/10 FROM (SELECT sum("n") AS r FROM "applied-txs" WHERE $timeFilter AND node = $node GROUP BY time(10m) fill(0))

SELECT "node" FROM "block" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "event", "type", "source"
SELECT "node" FROM "block" WHERE $timeFilter AND "node" = $node GROUP BY "event", "type", "source",  "node"

panels.title: Blocks and micros by node (can switch nodes)

targets.query: SELECT "n" FROM "connections" WHERE ("node" = 0) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "n" FROM "connections" WHERE ("node" = 1) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "n" FROM "connections" WHERE ("node" = 2) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "n" FROM "connections" WHERE ("node" = 3) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "n" FROM "connections" WHERE ("node" = 4) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "n" FROM "connections" WHERE ("node" = 5) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "n" FROM "connections" WHERE ("node" = -10) AND $timeFilter
SELECT type, btype, "from", node AS "to", event, id, "parent-id", height, txs, bt, score FROM "block" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT type, btype, "from", node AS "to", id, "parent-id", height, txs, bt, score FROM "block" WHERE event='Mined' AND $timeFilter
SELECT node AS "to", "id", "height" FROM "block" WHERE "type" = 'Block' AND ("event" = 'Applied' OR "event" = 'Mined') AND $timeFilter AND (node::tag = '3' OR node::tag = '1')
SELECT "depth" FROM "rollback" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "prop-time" FROM "block" WHERE ("event" = 'Received') AND ("type" = 'Block') AND ("source" = 'Broadcast') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "prop-time" FROM "block" WHERE ("event" = 'Received') AND ("type" = 'Block') AND ("source" = 'Ext') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "prop-time" FROM "block" WHERE ("event" = 'Received') AND ("type" = 'Micro') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "bt" FROM "block" WHERE "event" = 'Mined' AND "type" = 'Block' AND $timeFilter  AND "node" < 6
SELECT "bt" FROM "block" WHERE "event" = 'Mined' AND "type" = 'Block' AND $timeFilter  AND "node" > 5
SELECT "node", "n", "incoming","outgoing" FROM "connections" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "upper" FROM "waves-node-timers" WHERE ("category" = 'system-metric' AND "entity" = 'network' AND ("metric" = 'rx-bytes' OR "metric" = 'rx-bytes')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY hostname

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "block" WITH KEY = "node"
list.name: node
